title: Lifting patients. Part 2. In the home
creator_credit: Great Britain. Ministry of Health and Kinocraft
brief_description: Demonstrates lifting techniques and explains the principle on which they are based, which removes the possibility of spinal injuries and strain. Primarily for district nurses, health visitors and others in the field of domiciliary nursing and could also be extremely useful to relatives who are nursing patients at home.
